title: Hoshii Toki Dake, Suki Na Dake
alternative_title: 欲しいときだけ、好きなだけ
status: 欲しいときだけ、好きなだけ
description:
Description :
        Fuhoe Scans: Tsubaki, who was perfect in looks and at his job, was going through a stressful time at work due to unreasonable power harassment. Then one day, he was assigned to look after Makino, who had just come to work from the countryside. Tsubaki was yelled at by Makino, who has a strong sense of justice, which soured his mood, but it turned out Makino had moved into the room next to Tsubaki's at the company dormitory.Makino was someone he wouldn't get along with, or so Tsubaki thought, but he was mesmerized by the other man's body when they bumped into each other in the bathroom...More...Fuhoe Scans: Tsubaki, who was perfect in looks and at his job, was going through a stressful time at work due to unreasonable power harassment. Then one day, he was assigned to look after Makino, who had just come to work from the countryside. Tsubaki was yelled at by Makino, who has a strong sense of justice, which soured his mood, but it turned out Makino had moved into the room next to Tsubaki's at the company dormitory.Makino was someone he wouldn't get along with, or so Tsubaki thought, but he was mesmerized by the other man's body when they bumped into each other in the bathroom. Plus, they ended up impulsively hooking up after an incident."Let me take care of you, if you're alright with me."Tsubaki suggests being friends with benefits because he doesn't want to get serious, but he can't refuse in the face of Makino's enthusiasm.Volume Extra (after days) includedE-Book Version Extra (Daily Life in the Kunimi Dormitory) includedLess...+
